I've got to say, that was one hell of a ride. I can't even express how many hours I spent on this game. Portal 1, on the other hand, felt pretty easy when I first played it. It took me about 4 hours to complete it. Don't get me wrong, I think they're both great. I don't often to play co-op though, but yet I have to admit, this is a really great game and I think you should buy it regardless.
